channel.title: Networks on Logs
channel.description: Recent content in Networks on Logs

item.title: Upgrade Your Networks
item.description:
Patching your infrastructure is one of the best ways to have a huge impact on your security posture. While this is undebateble fact and while some organizations have this under control many still struggle to keep up with the emerging vulnerabilities.

As a response to an alarming state of how many networks still run unpatched and the growing number of network exploits I created this project called LAN Upgrade. As of today it’s capable of patching IOS-XE switches (and possibly routers -> needs to be tested) in mass and in parallel saving a lot of time and money while reaching the objective of running safe and up to date network.
